properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first American military balloon flight on May 31, 1862, in Richmond, Virginia, U.S.A., by Thaddeus S.C. Lowe with hot-air balloon; cancellation stamp dated May 31, 1984 in Richmond; includes information on reverse.
